targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_orders 
FROM transaction_data

SELECT SUM(price * quantity) as total_revenue 
FROM transaction_data

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as registered_users 
FROM users

SELECT 
  payment_method,
  SUM(quantity) as total_quantity,
  COUNT(*) as order
FROM transaction_data
GROUP BY payment_method
ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC

SELECT
    c.city,
    c.state,
    c.latitude,
    c.longitude,
    SUM(t.quantity * t.price) AS total_sales
FROM
    transaction_data t
JOIN
    us_coordinates c
ON
    t.city = c.city
   AND t.state = c.state
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(t.timestamp)
GROUP BY
    c.city, c.state, c.latitude, c.longitude
ORDER BY
    total_sales DESC;

SELECT 
  category,
  SUM(quantity) as total_quantity,
  COUNT(*) as order
FROM transaction_data
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC

SELECT 
  shipping_method,
  SUM(quantity) as total_quantity,
  COUNT(*) as order
FROM transaction_data
GROUP BY shipping_method
ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC

SELECT
    payment_method,
    SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM
    transaction_data
GROUP BY
    payment_method
ORDER BY
    total_quantity DESC;

SELECT
    shipping_method,
    SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM
    transaction_data
GROUP BY
    shipping_method
ORDER BY
    total_quantity DESC;

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_orders 
FROM transaction_data 
WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE -- Query resets daily at midnight

SELECT SUM(price * quantity) as total_revenue 
FROM transaction_data 
WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE -- Query resets daily at midnight

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as registered_users 
FROM users
WHERE DATE(last_updated) = CURRENT_DATE

SELECT 
  payment_method,
  SUM(quantity) as total_quantity,
  COUNT(*) as order
FROM transaction_data
WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY payment_method
ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC

SELECT
  category AS "Product Name",
  SUM(price * quantity) AS "Revenue"
FROM
  transaction_data
WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY
  category
ORDER BY
  "Revenue" DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  category,
  SUM(quantity) as total_quantity,
  COUNT(*) as order
FROM transaction_data
WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC

SELECT 
  shipping_method,
  SUM(quantity) as total_quantity,
  COUNT(*) as order
FROM transaction_data
WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY shipping_method
ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC

SELECT
  state,
  SUM(price * quantity) AS "Revenue"
FROM
  transaction_data
WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY
  state
ORDER BY
  "Revenue" DESC
LIMIT 10

WITH time_buckets AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        date_trunc('minute', NOW() - INTERVAL '6 hours'),
        date_trunc('minute', NOW()),
        INTERVAL '1 minute'  -- ← Changed to 1-minute intervals
    ) as time_bucket
),
order_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp) as time_bucket,  -- ← Simplified for 1-minute grouping
        COUNT(*) as order_count
    FROM transaction_data 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '6 hours'
    GROUP BY time_bucket
)
SELECT 
    tb.time_bucket as time,
    COALESCE(oc.order_count, 0) as "order"
FROM time_buckets tb
LEFT JOIN order_counts oc ON tb.time_bucket = oc.time_bucket
ORDER BY tb.time_bucket

WITH time_buckets AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        date_trunc('minute', NOW() - INTERVAL '6 hours'),
        date_trunc('minute', NOW()),
        INTERVAL '1 minute'
    ) AS time_bucket
),
revenue_per_minute AS (
    SELECT 
        date_trunc('minute', timestamp) AS time_bucket,
        SUM(price * quantity) AS revenue
    FROM transaction_data
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '6 hours'
    GROUP BY time_bucket
)
SELECT 
    tb.time_bucket AS time,
    COALESCE(rpm.revenue, 0) AS revenue
FROM time_buckets tb
LEFT JOIN revenue_per_minute rpm ON tb.time_bucket = rpm.time_bucket
ORDER BY tb.time_bucket

SELECT 
  id,
  order_id,
  user_id,
  city,
  state,
  quantity,
  (price * quantity) as total_price,
  shipping_method,
  payment_method,
  timestamp
FROM transaction_data 
ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
LIMIT 20
